content.detailedDescription: These photos were taken during the day after a big storm had passed over lake wentworth, nh in june of 2012. the person shooting the photos is the long time girlfriend of my second cousin. she told me that the objects were not visible to the eye but showed up after each photo was taken. she said she noticed the objects in the camera while shooting.  we've known about these photos for a while but it wasn't until i was going over the photos with her last week that we noticed in the picture where the object becomes much darker and thinner that two orbs appear horizontally to the right of the object. this made the photo more convincing to me and we decided to submit it to mufon. the photographer of this photo made it very clear that there were no birds or insects in the immediate and general area while she was taking photos of the storm.
content.summary: My cousin's girlfriend was taking photos after a big storm had passed and this object kept appearing in the pictures.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my porch having coffee and looking at the moon, which was bright and to the southwest. almost directly in front of me, there was a very bright star. i believed it to be venus. the star was bright and fixed. it was about 5:45 a.M. the sky was getting lighter out.

as i gazed at the sky, i could hear a commercial plane coming from behind my apartment building. it is not unusual to see commercial planes. we don't see too many though. commercial planes fly south to north. we are in between columbus, ga and atlanta, so the planes we see are heading to the atlanta airport. they always fly in the same direction.

as the sound of the plane grew closer, the bright star began to move from it's fixed spot in the western sky. i watched it move north to northeast. it moved in a straight path and moved fast. not fast like a shooting star, but faster than a plane. 

the star was high in the sky, not close to the altitude of the plane. by this time, the plane is flying over my porch. i could see blinking lights on the plane, but none on the star that was moving. i could tell that the star was much higher up in the sky than the plane, but cannot give a guess as to how high.

the star moved to the northeast but it also appeared to be moving upwards into the sky.

eventually,it moved past the apartment building to my left and i lost sight of it.

the star was very bright and never lost it's brightness. it did seem to get smaller the further up it moved.
content.summary: Looked like a star, thought it was venus, then it moved.

content.detailedDescription:
My mother and i were driving across the mountain one night as we both started to feel strange. we knew that area very well, but all of a sudden we could not recognise where we were or any of the surroundings. a few minutes later, as we were making our way down the mountain, i saw a clear red and green light pulsating in the valley below. the strange sensation continued as we discussed why there would be roadwork in the valley at this late hour. mere minutes after reaching the valley itself, the lights suddenly appeared above the road as we came around a bend. the lights were situated side by side at least a car-length apart, one pulsating brightly as the other dimmed in a repeated cycle. the surrounding terrain was dark and undisturbed by the lights. it was so close at that point that we had no time to stop, but ended up driving directly underneath it. i bent forward and look up at it, but i have no memory of what i saw, i only remember feeling that it was a bad idea to look up at it while beeing this close. my mother was terrified, but i felt no fear as i begged her to stop the car and drive back. she refused to turn around, but agreed to stop so that i could take pictures. as i looked back at the lights i noticed how quiet everything was, and i realised that this thing couldnt possibly be a helicopter. i got back in the car and we left the area, but minutes later we noticed that the lights followed at a distance. we both got scared at this point. it followed for several minutes, then suddenly disappeared. we thought that was the end of it, but then my mother yelled that there was another light on her side of the car, across the river just above the treetops. this light was bright white and followed the car briefly through the twists and turns of the terrain. suddenly the white orblike light flashed brightly twice, illuminating the treetops below, then it was gone too. 

for months after this incident we both felt very disoriented whenever we passed through the valley. the few scattered houses seemed to come in the wrong order, the landscape was strangely unfamiliar and i didnt even remember the large bridge crossing the river, and thats been there my whole life. i also experienced a severe headache with a following nosebleed after this event, which repeated itself the following year on the exact date of the first.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two pulsating lights side by side, one red and one green, hovering above the road. the car passed right underneath it. the lights followed the car, then disappeared. moments later a white light appeared beside the car, flashed brigth, then vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
1. sitting on the back patio on a warm day. 

2. i heard a sort of buzzing/humming sound and noticed hundreds of small shadows on the concrete, like bird shadows, except birds don't usually cast shadows that you notice. there were no bird-like sounds.

3. i thought it was a swarm of humming birds or large insects at first. but when i looked up there was nothing there and nothing in the surrounding area.

4. the shadow(s) moved very fast like a flock of birds from west to east and took about 10 seconds to pass. there was no distinct edge or shapes except that it appeared that there were several hundred (or thousand) individual shadows.

5. my mind told me that a flock of something was flying overhead but i couldn't register what it was. then, when i looked up, i was astonished that there was nothing to see.

6. i never got a positive visual on the object. it crossed my mind that it may have been a transparent object that was refracting light and not able to completely muffle its noise.
content.summary: Shadow swarm

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my living room at about 10:30am on sunday and i noticed out the corner of my eye something moving past some trees and a section of the sky i can see from my living room.

for an instant i thought it was one of those big green cargo helicopters carrying a car or something.
so i got up and went outside and realized that it wasnt a helicopter at all. there was no noise for a start but there was this big object moving in the sky.

starting at the bottom of this almost alive live craft had a round black ball like bottom which was flashing an intermittent light. it was flashing but not in the same way a bright light we know to be.
this ball structure led up in a slender tether kind of connection to the side of an airplane nose cone shaped black dome on its side. there was then from the open end of the nose cone and kind of solid light that was being projected forward out of the back side of the cone and forming the rest of the craft. if you imagine the shape of an oval but stretched a little this was what the overall shape of the main body of the craft was.

the tether or whatever that was had at one stage a circular spoked kind of shape in the centre but that form eventually disappeared.

the craft appeared to change several times in colour and light. there was a type of pulsating of what i assumed was the crafts cockpit the whole time but it looked like there was some kind of metallic roof and floor which exented from the dome shape edges.

it wasnt moving fast. i felt like i knew i was observing it and it almost casually meandered off in a westerly direction. 

i watched it for a good 5 minutes and the whole time it moved in a snake like, seahorse like manner. the main body of the craft was almost looking around like a snake would.

there was still an intermittent flashing from the ball of the tail and it remained in a two part connected shape for as long as i could see it.

when i saw it it was at about 24deg and i watched it for about 5-7 mins and it was moving at a rate of about 10mph - 20mph. it was a clear blue sky and i watched it disappear into the sky at about 30deg.

i just doesnt make sense. if it were an air craft of any sort then there would have been sound. it couldnt have been anything i know of because it disappeared into the outer stratosphere on a 5 degree inclination with an 80deg cross wind to its direction. the wind wasnt strong but there was a breeze so anything not under control would be blowing the other way.

no helicopter or plane i know of could achieve the altitude this thing was at and disappear into the clear blue sky.

im not the greatest drawer but ive attached a drawing. it still seems so vague what i actually saw but i can see in my minds eye what it was that i saw really clearly...If that makes sense
content.summary: Two part craft connected by some kind of teather with light like matter as the main body.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the roof with my cousin at my grandfather's home which is located in jk colony in kanpur, india. we were some stuff around 1 a.M. and then i just turned my head and saw this object falling vertically some 1.5 kilometers away from us and some 500 feet above the ground and then suddenly it burned in flames as it was coming down. my cousin also saw it. our view was blocked by a water tank not far away from us. it wasn't a meteor for sure. we were amazed to see it. we later checked on the newspaper and internet if there was any meteor/ ufo reporting in that area, but i couldn't find anything which was little shocking. i guess that thing fell in the river nearby over which there's a bridge constructed which is used when we go from kanpur to lucknow. our initial thought was that it was some maybe broken satellite part or a ufo. please check into this matter.
content.summary: Vertically falling then burning in flames

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were on a walk and i was joking with her saying her braces in her mouth could communicate with aliens. we just laughed about it as we continued walking. we timed it on previous walks on the same path. it was 25 minutes. on the night of the ufo sighting we seen three distinctive colors. it was as if it had a heart beat. white, red and black were the colors. we watched it scan just above the tree line for a good distance and then return back to the original place we first seen it in and pulsate again. then i remember seeing the object fly very fast to the sky in a very odd angle. it stayed there for what seemed a short time as if it were retrieving something and the quickly returned back to its original location. it began pulsating the same color and pattern again. then last was a black light that seemed to suck itself backwards into a hole. when it left my girlfriend was in fear. i was in shock. we both realized we were missing about an hour and a half time from when we left for the walk. for a couple weeks we spoke to each other and explained that someone had followed us home that night and a feeling as if someone was with us for a couple weeks.  we both wondered if we were abducted because of the loss of time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I've been abducted in the past but this time i was with my girlfriend on a walk. we both seen a ufo hovering above the tree line. it pulsated three different colors as if communicating. the color was white, red then black. it traced a path over tree line.

content.detailedDescription: Im a very detailed aviation observer, i live near a small airport but this object is not an airplane or helicopter.  it is extremely high, almost thought it was a star but living in the middle of los angeles its very rare to see any stars.  this object is super bright flashing blue/white/red/orange very fast.  much faster than aircraft lights.  object is very high in altitude and is completely stationary.  i have never seen anything like this in the sky before.
content.summary: Flashing lights too high to be helicopter or airplane, hovering and flashing random colors.

content.detailedDescription: Me, my mother, aunt and neighbors were sitting on the front porch when we seen what we thought was a helicopter because it was so low. as it got closer we could see two light blue lights parallel that moved super fast. i tried to chase it down the road but it was going so fast. nothing i have ever seen could move that fast, nothing!!! twas an ufo! i feel star struck theres no way what i saw was a meteor. it wasnt falling from the sky it was moving parallel to the ground just above the tree tops. the two lights stayed in line with each other having one in front and one behind. the distance between the two never changed. it zoomed past at a crazy speed but didnt make and noise at all. strangest/coolest thing i've ever seen!
content.summary: Two lights traveling at high speed.

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 1968 i was catching butterflies in the green-belt across the street from where i lived. when i saw the 1"-1 1/2" diameter craft just above the flowers where i was catching the butterflies. i was in shock and did not believe what i was seeing and just watched it land then took off then move over a foot or so land then take off again.The next time it landed i set the large jar that i was using to catch the butterflies over it when it landed. when it took off again i quickly screwed the lid on the jar. then i let the craft land in the bottom of the lid. i laid in the grass and just starred at this craft i just caught. when it went to move over it hit the side of the jar it then went bouncing very quickly side to side. to the point i thought it was going to break the jar. i jumped up ran across the street yelling for my dad. i slid the jar under my t-shirt thinking it might calm it down but it just kelp banging the jar back and forth so i opened the jar. put my hand on top and caught the craft in my bear hand and started to run towards the front door when something poked me in my right palm. the pain of the poke caused me to yell out loud ouch and the craft flew right out of my hand. it did not leave a mark or break the skin. i ran into the house and got my my dad to come out. but because of the small size my dad was unable to pick up the small craft in the sky. i stood there and watched it go up higher and higher until it was out of sight. i still remember that day like it happen today and if i would just have left it in the jar i would had the proof of this small craft.For forty years had not told a soul of that day. but i felt now is the time. i don't care if you read this and think it is just a story. i know it happen i gain nothing by telling my story. i don't want to become famous from telling my story. just felt now is the time to tell it. i think the craft was better off getting away because if it was caught in the jar and my dad and i took it to the government. they would have killed what ever was inside if there was anything inside it. that i will never know.
content.summary: Found when catching butterflies caught it in jar then lost it when something poked me in my right hand

content.detailedDescription: 1.It happened at walrus island. a island were people can not live because it all rugged rocks with no water. out in the middle of the ocean full of walrus and polarbears and no place to land boats. but we were there with a film crew trying to film walrus under water.                               2.We saw it far away about 20 to 30 miles away flying towards us it was very bright                                                                3.We thought it was plane or helicopter but it seemed way to bright.       4.It was flying slow and vary steady and when it got close to us it stop moving when it seemed to see us. it looked to be like a oval disk shape but it was to bright to see it good so i tried to get some binocs did not find them so i got my rifle it has a scope then when i put my gun up to look at it. it shot up out off site in about 1 or 2 seconds.               5.At first just thought it was just a plane or helicopter but as it got closer started to pay attention to it because it made no sound and it was a vary calm early morning . but when it stopped we just thought it might be a helicopter but made no sound and it was only about 500 feet away and about 60 feet off the ocean that's when i got my scoped rifle to get a good look at it but a soon as i put my gun up it blasted off. that when we knew we just a ufo we where both amazed we watched a ufo for about 30 minutes                                                                    6.It shot up back about 45 degrees up out of site in streak of lite in just a second.                                                             the next day the we found a big walrus with a big hole cut out of it but it was still alive but it got back in the water before we could set up the camera and later that night it went from a calm clear night but in a just a few minutes there was a one bright flash and extremely loud bang and then a hurricane and waves going so fast we were lucky to have survive that night next early morning back to calm and clear weather.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: No person could handle how fast it took off

content.detailedDescription: On new years eve dec.31,2012 at approximately 9:14 p.M a light caught my eye out my kitchen window it was same color as street light but too high in sky then i realized it was moving closer ,i started going to back door yelled at my husband and grandkids who were watching t.V in basement to come quick.We all went outside then it was in full view from the side ,cigar shaped object glowing orange-red,just the object was glowing not around it.I remember saying" what is that".Then it slowed down it seemed to stop actually then it was going away to the east.This was not man made or an airplane or chinese lanterns.Also it seemed like it had windows i kept blinking my eyes ,because i was in awe,you know the square boxes that obsure peoples faces on t.V well that is what i say when i thought it was windows.
content.summary: See light at distance,came closer,slowed down went east ,orange red glowing object,cigar shaped

content.detailedDescription: At or around 22:47.30 eastern time zone while photographing moon. noticed when enlarging a series of 4 photos taken during a duration of 2 seconds noticed a black object cross the face of the moon from right to left. there was no running lights that are normally viewed of airplane traffic at night.
content.summary: Black object crossed infront of moon

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my backyard, enjoying a fire.  it was a couple of minutes after the end of the montreal's international firework contest that i could not see but i could hear.  

out of nowwhere, in the sky above my neighbor's house tree line, i saw 4-5 dimanond shapes red lights dancing in the sky.  they appeared to be at least over a mile away because the object were small from where i was standing.

and then, they just disapeared after a good 10 minutes dancing.
content.summary: I saw 4-5 diamond shape red lights hovering in the sky, over the tree lines.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were at new center school in sevierville. we had just finished walking and decided to swing. we were swinging for about 10 minutes then i spotted a light out of the corner of my eye. i looked up and seen three ball shaped lights just moving slowly in like a perfect triangle formation. i thought it may be a plane but i have never seen a plane like that. one was a darker orange color and the other two were more yellow. i couldn't stop looking at it. it was moving slow then started to disappear. we even sat and waited about thirty minutes to try and see it again but it didn't appear.   i first seen the object around 9:45 pm. i also apologize for the second of foul words in the video.
content.summary: I seen something out of the corner of my eye, looked over and they were moving slowly then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I had walked to my clubhouse pool from the back of my home to retrieve my grandson's paddle board, about a 5 mins. walk. my home is located near a pond in a new development. i had to walk around the north east perimeter of the pond to get to the clubhouse. there are no tall trees or electric lines from my point of view to obstruct full view of the sky. it was dusk. on the walk back to my home, the object was actually behind me, or north of me. what caught my attention was the speed with which the object was traveling. i find it strange that it was the speed that caught my attention and not the brilliant light. i had to turn around to watch and for a few seconds i had a completely clear view of a brilliant blue-white light, sphere shaped, that had light vertical and horizon lines on it traveling westward at super speed. this was mechanical not organic. i have never seen anything move this fast. then the light split in two and both lights shot upwards into the clouds. there was no sound. i felt a little spooked afterwards. these are things that other people see.
content.summary: Brilliant blue-white light, sphere shaped, traveling westward at super speed, split in two. both lights shot upward into clouds.

content.detailedDescription: July 13 9:32 pm i was sitting in my back porch with my dog in the driveway and i happened to look up and noticed a very bright orange sphere or a light with yellow around the edges traveling due east from the west it moved similar to what you would see the space shuttle which i've seen many times but this was much larger much brighter. about six seconds later another one came from the same direction appearing to be much higher or somewhat smaller same brightness same yellow edges same path except for it was perhaps a little bit further north did not follow the exact same path but same direction for sure. i live near o'hare airport in des plaines just north of the airport i've seen many planes i know with the space station looks like this was totally different it was much larger than the space you should station but took on the same appearance as far as when i watched it disappeared how the space shuttle would just vanish at one point both objects did the exact same thing my emotions after seeing it were unbelievable . i could not believe i was seeing what i was seeing .
content.summary: I was sitting on my back porch with my dog in the yard looked up and noticed an orange bright orange light with yellow edges flying from the west to the east then looked up and saw another smaller or higher one same color same direction.

content.detailedDescription:
July 6th around 4pm i was in the backyard manning the bbq. during this time of day in central florida, the clouds build and bloom up into the sky. it is a spectacle in itself. so as i flipped burgers i also kept an eye to the sky to watch the building cloud activity.  i noticed a group of black crows flying about as high as i have ever seen them (perhaps 5,000 feet) so i was just watching the black crows riding the updrafts and i caught sight of what i thought was a dark jet aircraft thousands of feet higher and a mile further away. the jet was not what i expected once i started to get a good look at it after it neared the top of the newly developing cumulus cloud. i was confused by the crafts  orientation during flight. i could not see any wings, just a round dull dark object moving like a jet aircraft, straight on a path, then it took an unexpected turn downward tracing the angle of the cloud. i looked again (i was wearing my polarized prescription sun glasses) and again i could not see any indications of wings. without wings for orientation of the "jet" i could not tell if it were a barrel roll of what maneuver could possibly make that sharp turn. there was no noise at all, not a whisper. since i had a nice photo taken of this sky (i occasionally practice with my  camera using airliners as subjects),  i sat down with photoshop and created this visual illustration to document what i had seen as accurate to scale as i could. i am a registered architect so i am quite used to creating visualizations. i am also a usaf veteran, quite familiar with most aircraft.

when this craft took the downward turn it was diving at a faster speed, then it actually slowed down at the bottom of its dive and took a reverse angle turn into the cloud. approximate time of viewing the flight path was about 15 sec. i kept staring at the cloud for the eventual exit with the assumed normal flightpath of a normal aircraft, but it never made an exit from the cloud. i told the family about what i saw and after lunch drew up this illustration using a preexisting photo taken a previous afternoon. it was a good reference because it had a jet airliner (note: wings) in the scene and i could relate all drawing elements to that. i needed to photoshop a facsimile of the subject cloud in this report but other than cloud that the image is a straight shot of the sky type that i saw that afternoon. i didn't file this report immediately because i wanted to see if anyone else reported something first. a type of verification since i was alone. however no reports have been filed and i will need to be one of the first. note that kennedy space center is perhaps 35 miles away from this objects position.
content.summary: Saw a dark sphere, act like a jet aircraft with extreme capabilities.

content.detailedDescription: Huge cigar-shaped  object completely covered in multi-colored lights winking or sparkling, reminded me of an encrusted hilt of a bejeweled hilt of a middle-eastern knife or sword.  it was just standing still in the air just above the tree-tops, and so wide that it could have covered 2 or 3 football fields.  and, it just stood still in the esky and appeared  to be no more than 500 to 1,000 feet away.  i pulled over to the side of the road and just sat and stared at it...Half expecting it to zoom off. but, it didn't.  it just sat there as if hovering in the sky.  while i watched, a woman traveling in the opposite direction (east) pulled over on her side of the road, and also stared at it.  she asked me what i thought it was?  i said i thought it was a ufo.  i told her to wait there as i lived only a block away, and i'd run home and get a camera.  i was back in less than 3 minutes, but the ufo was gone, and sowas the woman.  i surmised she just went on her way becaause the ufo had left.
content.summary: Huge cigar-shaped  object completely covered in multi-colored lights

content.detailedDescription:
On my back porch.Looking at the mocaptured  pictures. this thing was moving around fast. it was crazy! my sister and i saw it together. we were very surprised. we don't know what it is? it can't be a planet cause it moves quickly
i took a lot of pictures but only captured two with the object.I also got a picture of what i think would be a shooting star. then i stopped looking and went in thehouse.
content.summary: Looking at the moon and this thing was moving around fast.

content.detailedDescription:
I was with a couple of friends and one of them noticed something that startled them., she pointed to the direction this thing was at in the sky and it was very easy to spot.  it was moving along very fast and was going in a straight line, that adjusted it's path, almost in a curve like manner, changing it's flight path behind the tree line.  it seemed to be around 300 feet up and cruising along very quickly, around 400+ miles an hour and i tracked it for about 5 seconds.

it was moving too fast to run into the house to get my camera, but i happened to have my trumpet in my hands, so i played a loud note towards it's direction to see if these things react to a directed sound.  that was just prior to it changing direction, not if it's related or not, but those that want to do the math along how fast sound travels.

i felt there was an intelligence flying it, not sure of it's origin and can only speculate.  friend had the same reaction, her statement was "that is not an airplane! woah".

this is my fourth sighting so it's not as startling to me to observe. yet still, a little uneasy that something can fly through the local airspace with impunity.  i think if more people observed the skies with more scrutiny they would notice more of these., i wouldn't have noticed myself since i was pre-occupied for this instance for example.
content.summary: Low flying, fast moving disc/oval shaped craft.

content.detailedDescription: A flight of 16 ufo discs (flying saucer looking)silver-colored, flying in formation, zig-zaging left, then right to down, then stopping, then backward up again, then parallel to the right, then swishing upward and flying out of sight in an instant!  all told, it was about 5 minutes, and was observed by me (at age 12), the traffic cop with me, and  2 children (about 8 years old) and their parents waiting to cross the street.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 16 flying saucers flying in formation of 4 across and four down, jetting back, stop, sideways, stop, zig-zaging, stopping between, and then zooming up and away in an instant!

content.detailedDescription: My wife noticed walking by dinning room window, i got up to look at what she was seeing. i went out side to get a better look at it,it was a very brite white light that seem to pulsate. we watched it till we lost sight of it.  we have seen these orbs four differnt times since 2011.  we also seen a kraft in sept. 2013 will driving on interstate 90. we were driving thur north bend,wa
content.summary: When first seen it came over the ocean from n.W. to s.E. till lost site of it.

content.detailedDescription:
I was hitting balls on our practice range at san joaquin country club. when following the flight of one of my balls, i noticed a white object in the sky...The range, of course, faces the same direction at which i saw the object. it stood out because of its dull, chalky white color in a clear, unobstructed sky. initially i thought it was one of our resident egrets. that initial interpretation lasted only a second or two, as the object was moving as though gliding, but on a level course and no other movement. since no bird wings flapped, my second thought was it might be a single engine plane. there is a small airfield in the approximate direction in which i was looking. as i continued to observe, i noticed that it was not in the traffic pattern for that field, and this object was closer to me than the airfield. i am a general aviation pilot so i am used to estimating altitudes. my estimate was that it was at 1000 to 1200ft. my perspective was, if 90 degrees is head on, i was at a point around 70 degrees moving right to left. 

it became clear to me that the object was rectangular. there were no rounded edges front or back. no wings. no propellor, no noise, which i would have been able to discern at the distance this object was from me. it was about 30-40ft long and its depth/height was, at my distance, a little less than a pencil held at arm's length. 

in the process of hitting balls, one looks down to position the next shot, which i did, as well as wipe the clubface clean of dirt. this takes maybe 5 seconds. i performed this small proceedure with the expectation that when i looked up again i would be able to follow the object some more. however, as i looked up, it had disappeared completely. i searched the sky thinking that the object may have turned its "tail" toward me. after many seconds doing this, i became disappointed that i had looked away, even for a few seconds. 

i was fascinated by the object because i couldn't come up with an explanation of what it might have been. when i left after my practice, i called my brother and two other friends and described the incident. 

i went to the course today for more practice and i asked one of our range managers, a retired teacher who happens also to be fairly well traveled, if he had seen anything. i let him tell me what he saw before i mentioned any particulars. he described almost exactly as i have here the very same features and actions of the object i witnessed. this is why i have stated there were two witnesses. i did not ask on the day of the event any of the others, maybe two or three persons, if they had seen anything.
content.summary: Chalky white, rectangular object, full daylight, clear sky, observed in  sw sky, traveling sw

content.detailedDescription: Relaxing on back porch, son spoted a very bright glow coming across our area of observation.  quickly ran into house, retrieved binoculars to observe object.  object moved in straight flight path estimated at 15000 ft, moving at an extremely fast pace.  this object easily traveled 10-15 miles in less than 30 seconds.  because of the time lost in retrieving bino's i could not get a clear view.  in about 5-10 minutes max another object same as above again traveled across same flight path.  with bino's in hand i observed a sphere shaped object that had 5 seperate bright orange glow sections.  again object was in view less than 30 seconds, could not believe the intensity of the bright orange glow this aircraft emitted.  finally once again a third aircraft flew over the same flight path, probable 8-10 minutes from last sighting.  the object as viewed with bino's was exactly as second craft.  this craft however once banked east at a very prononced pitch, then was out of my vision.  my house lies in the flight path of incoming aircraft to tampa int. airport.  no civilian a/c flew during these incounters.  i waited outside an additionally 30 minutes and began observing civilian a/c once again flying into tampa, which i could also hear, which is is common because of there reduced altitude.  there is no doubt these object where observed at both tampa int. and macdill afb.  as a 20 year us army special forces soldier i have observed no object that matched this sighting to include b1 and b2 bombers, assorted fast movers, nasa shuttle launches and having witnessed scud & mlrs missile projectiles in the 1st gulf war.  this event was very unusual and worth noting.
content.summary: 3 seperatevery bright orange spheres moving across sky tampa fl 12 july 2014

content.detailedDescription: My 28 year old daughter and i were sitting outside at the end of our drive way as we often do . we had seen some lights that looked like camera flashes in the sky south and southeast of us . we kept watching for them and saw them a few times . at about 12:00 am (midnight)we were watching some other weird things in the sky that were not airplanes or helicopter as they were making no noise at all and they would appear and then disappear , we at first thought they were stars , but then we felt something overhead and we both looked up to see a craft that was shaped like a missile or rocket . it was long and had short wing looking things on both sides towards the back and the front of the craft , there was 2 rows of yellow lights going along the length of the craft . my daughter had her phone with her but we were so stunned that we didn't think to take pictures of the thing , we watched it as it went slowly over head .It made no noise at all it was totally silent .As it went passed we watched it as far as we could watch it and then it veered off to the right or to the west and then for a few seconds we lost site of it . we caught site of it again across the highway and over towards the college so we went down to the entrance of where we live and we saw it again heading west . it went higher and then just was gone , i don't know if it disappeared or it just went so fast away that we could not see it leaving , we have seen a lot of things in the sky over where we live and a lot of it we can not explain , we see airplanes and helicopters but then we see things that are not . we have seen a saucer shaped ufo fly over and when it turned lightly we saw a rounded top on it but could not see anyone inside . we have seen round one with strobing lights and flashing lights that are too bright to be planes .About a week after we had our siting of the rocket shaped ufo i was on face book and one of my face book friends had drawn a picture of a ufo that someone he knows saw in fresno california i believe and it was the same thing that my daughter and i saw ,
content.summary: Rocket type with two rows of yellow lights along the bottom

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were sitting out on her front porch one summer night i believe it was 1981ish. it was maybe 10 or 10:30ish pm. i looked up to the end of the street and saw a bright round object coming across the front yard of the corner house across the street (two houses up from us). it went right up to the front of the house close to the bottom then raised up to the second floor. i nudged my friend to look up there. as soon as she looked up there this ball of light zoomed down the street (to the right) and stopped right in front of us (about 25 or less feet from us) and hovered a second or two then shot to the left and around to the backside of her house. my friend ran after it around her house but quickly came back after it disappeared. never saw it again. it definitely had direction and speed changes and purpose in it's movements. very cool!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw orb hover ascend rush towards us stop change direction

content.detailedDescription: We were driving from ruidosa on the hwy to going back home at around 8pm or so. we both realized there was a red light up pretty far ahead of us almost like a tower light. my boyfriend at the time was in the air force. he was like i don't think so but not sure. as we drove the red like seemed to have little more color to it as it got closer.  eventually it was coming down in front of us while we were driving. it almost seemed like it was in the middle of the road and it got to the point we we're going to hit it head on!  the light was so bright we couldn't even see.  i screamed to mike to stop. all the sudden we were still driving down the road i guess had gone through it i said why didn't you do something he said he couldn't said it was like he was just froze. he said look behind us. i looked back and we could see the light behind us and it was way behind us like a red light again.  then a few minutes later we could see the red light up in the sky then it was in the road again we went through or hit it or whatever happen and the same thing happen we could see it behind, then in front of us this happen over and over nothing we could do was like rewinding a movie over and over.  i was in the floorboard crying at times and he just cried. we would say should we pull over in between it coming back down but was scared to death we were out in no where pitch black. finally saw a small town and stopped immediately, also realized we had lost about a hr or so of time.  never been so scared in my life can't even explain and had never heard of ufo ' s tell after this had happened.  we were never going to tell anyone but every day i wonder what happened to us.
content.summary: The light came down in the middle of the hwy out in no where. then we either hit it or went through it and proceeded to do this over and over again like rewinding a movie about 10 times and etc. on the hwy between roswell and ruidoso

content.detailedDescription: Test
content.summary: Test

content.detailedDescription:
I originally repored this to the unforc, and have the object on video, but can't figure out how to get the video transferred for others to see. when i tried to send it to them via email, it was very distorted, and couldn't be seen as well as on my desktop. 
my daughter and i were heading out to the store. while heading north, just above the hill in the road, i saw a set of 2 green lights, moving at a very slow pace, keeping exact space between lights. i thought it was odd, but blew it off until i saw the lights again, only this time, there were 3 in a triangular shape, and the lights had changed to blue, and 1 flashing red light next to one of the blue ones. it was about 200 off the ground, and we were returning from the store when i noticed it outside the passenger (my)window.  i told my daughter to turn down the next road and when she asked why, i pointed and said, do you see that. she took the next road, which at the time had no lights on it, and sitting above a building, was a large object above the width of a 5 lane road, with absolutely no sound. i rolled down the window and started to film. as soon as i did, it started to slowly move away towards the mountains.  i discovered later that it was shortly seen in santa fe.
content.summary: Object triangular is shape heading n/ne, with 3 stationary lights and 1 flashing. lights changed color and was stationary when seen 2nd time.
